SEO Services

import { ServiceCard1 } from 'components/reuseable/service-cards';
import Search from 'icons/Search';

<ServiceCard1
  linkUrl='#'
  Icon={Search}
  linkType='yellow'
  linkText='Learn More'
  title='SEO Services'
  description='Nulla vitae elit libero, a pharetra augue.'
/>
